page.title: 05PROSPECT FARM
page.content: Mr Machin has owned Prospect Farm for 27 years. He has one combine harvester and has got 4 in storage. These are stored by a firm which sells farm machinery. On the farm there are 10 buildings and the oldest one is 30 years old. The old buildings were replaced . The farm house is on the site of a much older building. Mr Machin used to keep chickens as it was once a chicken farm. He is trying out evening primrose and lupins for their oil. He also grows winter barley, Spring barley, wheat and potatoes. Two men work on the farm. Most of the buildings are used for storage.He uses chemicals on the fields. He grows crops for money. When he first moved in he enlarged fields to get more crops.
